meanings: to be in the air (e.g. a feeling or mood)

lessons.japanese: 多くの人が目的なく人生を漂う。
lessons.english: Many people drift through life without a purpose.

lessons.japanese: 多くの人が目的なく人生を漂う。
lessons.english: Many people drift through life without a purpose.

lessons.japanese: 喜びの波は解き放たれた私の心を漂う。
lessons.english: Waves of joy drift through my opened heart.

lessons.japanese: この無限の空間に漂う永遠の沈黙が私を恐怖に陥れる。
lessons.english: The eternal silence of these infinite spaces terrifies me.

lessons.japanese: 氷は毎日相当な距離を漂うこともある。
lessons.english: The ice may drift considerable distances each day.

lessons.japanese: 地球は宇宙空間に漂う球体にすぎない。
lessons.english: The earth is just a sphere suspended in space.
